content.text: Steve, also known as "Asian Jim," is an actor friend of Jim and Pam. He appears in the Season Nine episode "Andy's Ancestry".  He came in posing as Jim Halpert because he had a dentist appointment. Throughout the scene, Dwight Schrute accuses him of not being Jim. Going along with the prank, he says that he has always been Asian ("Hats off to you for not seeing race") Being unconvinced, he asks Steve/"Jim" about the sales he made the other day. When Dwight sees that he knows Jim's voicemail password, he freaks out and accusses him of not being an employee. When Pam kisses him and he sees the picture of the family, he starts to question all reality.
